Articles.Content:
M teacher gave me this he knew how much I like space.

Erg it won't show the picture

 

Edited January 28, 2016 by Jim123

Hi Jim! You'll need to put the picture on a hosting site such as imgur or Dropbox and link to it on the Forum.

Also, this is the section for Mission Reports, about your ksp missions. Depending on what the picture is, it might better go in the Space and Spaceflight section, or the General forum. Good luck!
